format_data:
[{"fieldname": "print_heading_template", "fieldtype": "Custom HTML", "options": "

BAS Report

{{ _(doc.name) }}

Company : {{ _(doc.company) }}

"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "company", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Company"}, {"fieldname": "start_date", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Start Date"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "reporting_status", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Reporting Status"}, {"fieldname": "end_date", "print_hide": 0, "label": "End Date"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "{% for label in ['1a','1b','g1','g2','g3','g4','g10','g11','g14'] %} {% if doc.get(label+'_details') %}

BAS Label: {{ label |upper }}

{% set total = {'gpb' : 0 , 'gpa' : 0, 'gob' : 0, 'goa' : 0} %} {% for row in doc.get(label+'_details') %} {% if total.update({ 'gpb' : total.gpb + row.gst_pay_basis, 'gpa' : total.gpa + row.gst_pay_amount, 'gob' : total.gob + row.gst_offset_basis, 'goa' : total.goa + row.gst_offset_amount }) %} {% endif %} {% endfor %}
Voucher Type Voucher No Date Account Tax Code GST Pay Basis GST Pay Amount GST Offset Basis GST Offset Amount
{{row.voucher_type}} {{row.voucher_no}} {{row.date}} {{row.account}} {{row.tax_code}} {{ "$%.2f"|format(row.gst_pay_basis) }} {{ "$%.2f"|format(row.gst_pay_amount) }} {{ "$%.2f"|format(row.gst_offset_basis) }} {{ "$%.2f"|format(row.gst_offset_amount) }}
{{ "$%.2f"|format(total.gpb) }} {{ "$%.2f"|format(total.gpa) }} {{ "$%.2f"|format(total.gob) }} {{ "$%.2f"|format(total.goa) }}
{{ "$%.2f"|format(doc.get(label)) }}
{% endif %} {% endfor %}"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "

Summary for Company {{doc.company}}

G1 - Total Sales (Including GST) {{"$%.2f"|format(doc.get('g1'))}}
Does the amount shown include GST ? YES
G2 - Export Sales {{"$%.2f"|format(doc.get('g2'))}}
G3 - Other GST-Free Sales {{"$%.2f"|format(doc.get('g3'))}}
G4 - Input Taxed Sales {{"$%.2f"|format(doc.get('g4'))}}
G10 - Capital Purchases (Including GST) {{"$%.2f"|format(doc.get('g10'))}}
G11 - Non Capital Purchases (Including GST) {{"$%.2f"|format(doc.get('g11'))}}
G14 - Purchase without GST in the price {{"$%.2f"|format(doc.get('g14'))}}
Amounts you owe to the ATO
1A - GST on Sales {{"$%.2f"|format(doc.get('1a'))}}
Amounts the ATO owes you
1B -GST On Purchases {{"$%.2f"|format(doc.get('1b'))}}
Net GST {{"$%.2f"|format(doc.get('net_gst'))}}
"}]
name: AU BAS Report Format
